title: Signal detection
description:
Parse agent output for Ralph signals.

internal/engine/signals.go:
- Signal enum: None, Complete, Eject, Blocked
- ParseSignals(output string) (Signal, reason string)
- Regex patterns:
  - <promise>COMPLETE</promise>
  - <promise>EJECT: reason</promise>
  - <promise>BLOCKED: reason</promise>

Verify: Unit tests for all signal patterns.
closed_reason: Implemented signal detection with Signal enum (None, Complete, Eject, Blocked), ParseSignals function with regex patterns, and comprehensive unit tests
